title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti until al dente.
Meanwhile, cook pancetta in a large skillet until crispy.
Whisk eggs, cheese, and black pepper in a bowl.
Drain pasta, reserve some pasta water.
Add pasta to skillet with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg mixture and pasta water to create creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Tender chicken in a rich, creamy tomato sauce with aromatic spices.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or bake chicken until charred.
Fry onion and garlic until soft.
Add tomato passata and spices, simmer.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Smashed avocado on sourdough bread with cherry tomatoes and poached eggs.
instructions: Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Top with poached eggs, halved cherry tomatoes and chili flakes.
